summary: This bill, the Stand Strong for Medicare Act of 2025, amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage for fall prevention items, such as grab bars and shower chairs. It defines these items and specifies that they must be ordered by a physician or practitioner to be covered. Furthermore, the bill exempts payments for fall prevention items from sequestration. The amendments are slated to go into effect 60 days after the bill's enactment.
